title: Ocean Week - Nautilus Statue

embed.description: What is the Nautilus-themed Artificial Reef? The Nautilus artificial reef was the final reward in Ocean Week 2015. Players from all around Oceania played games with specific Ocean Week champions (like Fizz, Nami or Nautilus) to contribute one point per win. The points required to construct the artificial reef was a hefty 275,000 from all Oceanic players.

body:
Well I know for sure that I contributed more that 3 points (like in the 10-20's), but my name isn't on the boards. I know it is too late to get my name on the Statue but I am just wondering why my name isn't on there. I don't really think the name ferguslad is offensive but I don't know.
    {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} Feels Bad Man.

replies.body:
Hey Ferguslad,

I checked and you did not earn any points in Ocean Week 2015 (last year) you did however earn more than 10 points this year (Ocean Week 2016).

That means you will get your summoner name on the Ocean Week Wall which is still in progress and is the reward for this year.

The Nautilus artificial reef is from last year's event, which is why your name is not on it.
Would it be appropriate for myself to ask the same question? I've checked and double-checked but my name is not there, just wondering if its the same issue?

Hi Conspiire,

Yeah it's the same thing. You did not earn any points during Ocean Week 2015 (last year) which is why you are not on the reef.

You did earn 14 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year) so your name will be on the Ocean Week Wall.
Okay cheers, and I do think it would be handy for Riot to release some sort of public checking tool so that other don't have to ask Riot directly. But again, thankyou
They don't have my name up there either :/ they didn't do too much checking with this one. A lot of my friends aren't on their as well.

Hey R0sereaper,

You earned 2 points in Ocean Week 2015 (last year) which is not enough to get on the reef unfortunately.

You did earn 62 points during Ocean Week 2016 (this year) which means you will get your name on the Ocean Week Wall - which is still in progress.

My bad there I thought I participated in Ocean week 2015 
Thanks :)
